sql.name: tsformsum.tousuleixingnew
sql.item: select ty.c801800001 from {200} ty order by ty.c801842006

sql.name: tsformsum.shoulidishi
sql.item: select city.c801800001 from {400} city where city.c801800001!='集团' order by city.c801842006

sql.name: tsformsum.kehuleixing
sql.item: select usertype.c801800001 from {500} usertype order by usertype.c801842006

sql.name: tsformsum.yewupinpei
sql.item: select pp.c801800001 from {600} pp order by pp.c801842006
